title: 2008 VTV9 – Binh Dien International Women's Volleyball Cup
text:
The 2008 <a href="VTV9%20-%20Binh%20Dien%20International%20Women%27s%20Volleyball%20Cup">VTV9 - Binh Dien International Women's Volleyball Cup</a> was the 3rd staging . The tournament was held in <a href="%C4%90%E1%BA%AFk%20L%E1%BA%AFk">Đắk Lắk</a>, <a href="Vietnam">Vietnam</a>.
Pool standing procedure.
Match won 3–0 or 3–1: 3 match points for the winner, 0 match points for the loser<br>
Match won 3–2: 2 match points for the winner, 1 match point for the loser
